General distribution. Central ASia ( UzbekiStan , KyrgyzStan , TurkmeniStan , TajikiStan ); Europe (north to 63°), RuSSia (eaSt to Yakutia), North Africa, Turkey , PakiStan , ISrael , Mongolia , China ( Xinjiang ), India .
